description:
The world reacts to Whitebeard`s death with shock and awe. Meanwhile, Jimbei risks his life to save Luffy and Blackbeard reveals the depraved depths of his nefarious nature!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Lever de rideau. Barbe Noire se révèle au grand jour !
Show no Kaimaku: Akasareta Kurohige no Takurami
The Show Begins! Blackbeard`s Plot Is Revealed!
Шоу начинается! Черная борода раскрывает карты!
يبدأ العرض! تُكشف حبكة اللّحية السّوداء!
ショーの開幕 明かされた黒ひげの企み
